wikipedia_page.main: Aaron Dean Thomason (born 26 June 1997) is an English cricketer who plays for Sussex County Cricket Club. Primarily a right-handed batsman, he also bowls right-arm fast-medium. He made his first-class debut on 18 June 2019, for Sussex in the 2019 County Championship.
